CustomField.description: Per request from Operations, displays the Opportunity Ownerâ€™s Zone Manager for reporting.
CustomField.formula: If( CONTAINS(Owner.Manager.Manager.Title, "Zone Manager"), (Owner.Manager.Manager.FirstName & " " & Owner.Manager.Manager.LastName), If(CONTAINS(Owner.Manager.Title, "Zone Manager"), (Owner.Manager.FirstName & " " & Owner.Manager.LastName), "" ))
CustomField.label: Zone Manager
